review_text: Beautiful space with lovely hosts! Would definitely stay here again!

Absolutely loved Michael and Karen’s property. We were in town for UVA’s graduation and this was a fantastic location within walking distance. The kitchen was perfectly stocked, the bed was extremely comfortable and messages were responded to within a very short time. We had one request and they were very accommodating (thank you). If you are needing a place to stay in Charlottesville this would be a great choice.

If you’re a couple or single person that wants a perfectly located rental in/around downtown Charlottesville, this is the place for you.
Convenient, clean, quiet, older neighborhood. I walked home from downtown twice because the weather was so nice….right at a mile’s distance. Equally close to the UVA campus if you’re visiting for activities there.
Relative new construction and beautifully kept.
Could not have found a better match for my needs. Thankful to the hosts for their hospitality.
Easy check in, all good, great location close to Grounds.
Great place to stay near many Charlottesville attractions! Perfect for 2 people. Very clean, neat, and well stocked. Would stay again if in the area.

Perfect spot near campus! I stayed here for five days waiting for my apartment in town to be ready and what a great find! Right on the edge of campus, which was perfect for me to walk to work at the hospital! Michael was very responsive when I messaged him. Everything was very clean and it was a beautiful space! Nice and quiet and parking was convenient! Thanks for a perfect stay, Michael!
A great stay located right the heart of Charlottesville! Michael was so responsive and helpful with questions and recommendations.

We had a wonderful stay in Charlottesville. We visit a few times a year as our daughter is a student at UVA. The location was perfect-walkable to the university but peaceful in a small neighborhood. The accommodations were perfect-bed was comfy, very clean and modern apartment over a garage. Loved having off street parking. We will definitely book again when we need to be back in town!

Loved our one night stay at The Groundskeeper! My husband and I were in town for a concert and wanted something walkable to the John Paul Jones Arena. It was about a 15 minute walk. We felt comfortable and right at home in the guest house! The designated park spot was definitely a plus as well! Would definitely stay again!!

This place was exactly what we needed! It's small but cozy and comfortable. Think a hotel room but a bit bigger, much nicer and with a full kitchen. The bed was comfortable, the kitchen was well stocked with supplies (we cooked breakfast). The location was right where we needed, so it worked out great for us.

My husband Mat and I stayed here for our wedding week and it was so perfect for just us two, and even ok for a couple nights with my stepson on a small blowup. It was a little tight with him there, but still just felt cozy and reminded us of old school family vacations when it doesn't matter where or how you sleep!
The owners had a bottle of wine, a welcome note, and flowers waiting for us which was the nicest touch. Everything was just as expected, if not better, and so clean and felt very open and not cluttered at all even for a studio/loft style space.
The price felt like a total steal, and they were so prompt and helpful with any needs we had. They even offered more than we could've asked for or expected!
We highly recommend this place to stay. And plan to utilize them again if ever needed!
It was wonderful stay. The room was excellent!

This Airbnb was perfect for my husband and I when we needed a place to stay after a concert at JPJ. It was within walking distance to the arena and great restaurants. The place was beautiful, clean, and well thought out. We will definitely be back!
Would highly recommend staying at Michael’s place! Extremely clean, and the hosts were very responsive.
Beautiful loft, extremely well done with beautiful trim & fixtures. Peaceful but easy walk to JPJ. Highly recommend!!
Friendly, responsive and accommodating, Michael was an excellent host. The accommodations were excellent in terms of cleanliness, ease of access and location. We hope to come back.
Great space especially close to the first year dorms off of Alderman. Very nicely done. Convenient to get into the unit. You get your own parking space.

Amazing people with a lovely family. Stayed at accommodation for close to 3 weeks and were always super helpful. Always responsive. Accommodation was very comfortable and accessible. 10/10 experience.

5 stars. If arriving on gameday (Scott Stadium) be sure to tell the traffic control that you are staying on Lewis Mountain Rd. Great hosts, extremely accommodating! Beautiful property, we absolutely recommend.

First, you cannot beat the location. You're right on the doorstep of UVA's campus in the most beautiful neighborhood. The Groundskeeper is private and has its own parking space. It has all of the amenities you could ask for and is a very comfortable living space. We really enjoyed our time here and the access and proximity to the city. Michael and Karen are gracious hosts and no doubt will assist their guests with anything they might need.
Enjoyed our stay. Will definitely be back. Perfect location for all things UVA!
Lovely Airbnb! We had a great time!

Michael's place was so awsome. We were in town to see a concert at John Paul Jones arena.we arrived a little early and Michael was so nice to let us in. The room is very cozy and just like the pictures. we couldn't have asked for more and will likely come back another time to just explore Charlottesville some more.

Michael and Karen were great hosts. Their Groundskeeper guest house was brand new and just as advertised. The location was near the UVA campus and close to everything in Charlottesville. We would definitely hope to return on a future visit.
Beyond our expectations- felt like we were the first people to ever stay there it was clean and had that fresh brand new smell. Tucked in back of property feels private, perfect location near campus

I booked this place for my parents (both mid-60’s) and it was perfect. I wanted a comfortable, safe, quiet and peaceful space for them. It was their first visit to Charlottesville and they thoroughly enjoyed the place. They had no issues checking in whatsoever and were so excited to show me the place, even though I was already familiar with it based on photos :).
They enjoyed the area and went for morning walks during their stay, enjoying the UVa grounds. Michael was very responsive when they had a question, and the place was just as it was pictured. Thanks Michael for taking good care of my parents!
Great overall & wonderful location. Highly recommend!

We had a wonderful time in Charlottesville and loved the proximity of the place to the city. The place was clean and exactly as described tucked in the cutest little neighborhood. Michael was flexible with check-in time which was great considering we were driving from Birmingham. Would stay again!
Fantastic Location - walkable to every thing UVA and all the way to the downtown mall with sidewalks. Space was clean, hip and perfect for my time in Charlottesville! Definitely will stay again!

This comfy and convenient haven ticked all my boxes: close to restaurants, a market, and the downtown mall, plenty of amenities, and ample parking. (Be sure to look for the coffee and tea area outside the bedroom door.) When I needed a break, the beautiful backyard and patio beckoned. I hope to return whenever I’m in the area.
Great spot and well situated. Left the car behind both nights and walked to town for dinner. Would certainly stay again if we revisit Charlottesville
It's a great and cozy little place to spend a few nights. It's quiet and you can hear birds singing in the morning. The owners have the most adorable dog, which you might be lucky enough to glimpse!
For a last minute find on graduation weekend in Charlottesville, this was a relief to have available. Very private and sweet spot with a lovely garden oasis.
Clean and convenient
Great for a quick trip. Awesome location. Would stay again!
Easy check in, good communication and place as described. Great for a quick stay.
Perfect for a 1 night stay. I had everything I needed as biz traveler.
If you’re looking for that “at home” feel then look no further! 10/10 would stay again!!

Liz’s place is a wonderful place to stay for a quick night in the heart of Charlottesville. It’s really close to the walking mall and there’s an awesome little art park a couple blocks away. We are at brazos tacos there and strolled through all the sculptures and paintings and flowers afterwards. The whole place was clean, well lit to get in and out. It is inside their house, and they were there while we were, but they won’t bother you unless you bother them or initiate it. The laundry room you enter into is theirs, and someone was doing laundry when we got there. But there’s a door between that room and your room so it can be private even so. There’s a nice double door to the back yard with tables and chairs amongst numerous plants. Heated bathroom floor was awesome. There’s a corner store right across the street. Street parking, but didn’t have an issue. Suitable for one person or a couple, but I wouldn’t recommend more than that. Small mini fridge. Would recommend.

Accommodation was lovely, perfect for a weekend getaway. Even a small kitchenette area just outside the private bedroom stocked with the essentials. Loved the location, walking distance to downtown Charlottesville where we saw a show. Overall I would definitely stay again.
Fantastic little garden hideaway just a few blocks from historic downtown, mall, and great restaurants. Can’t wait to come back!
Had to book last minute stay and this fit needs for a night! Liz was responsive and check-in was easy
The room is an amazing experience on its own while also being so close to downtown Charlottesville! We felt very safe and at home... would definitely recommend this spot :)
a beautiful little retreat
Cozy spot in a great location!
Cozy, affordable, clean and convenient. What more do you need, really, for an overnight stay? I also appreciated the comfortable bedding and soft sheets, a rarity at many AirBnBs at this price point.
Perfect for a quick stopover in Charlottesville! Super comfortable bed and space was just as described.

Excellent place! Close to everything. It's cozy, clean with calm vibes. I appreciate Liz leaving some treats for breakfast plus coffee and more. We had a wonderful time there!. Will definitely stay in Liz' place again.
Nice, basic accommodation. Listing was accurate. We enjoyed our stay.

Very nice, clean and private room in the back of the house. Had our own entrance looking out on the garden. Close to downtown Charlottesville.
Definitively recommend staying there.
Comfortable & nicely decorated space, open & well-lit but still private. Nice yard also - I wish the weather would have afforded me the chance to sit out in the patio area a while.

This was a sweet spot in a great location. It was an easy walk to the pedestrian mall and there are great eating places within walking distance. The suite was very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed watching all of the birds outside the glass doors. The bed was comfortable and we had a peaceful nights sleep. It was easy to park on the street right in front of the house. We would be happy to stay there again.
Comfy bed!!!
Wonderful stay and very responsive. Would definitely stay again !
Perfect location, private, easy to get in/check out. Would book again in a heartbeat!
It was an excellent place to stay!!
was all around wonderful

It was a very pretty cozy room. The bed was very comfortable. The water in the water filter needed to be changed and there was no bottled water. Filtered water is recommended for the French press Liz provided for coffee so it would have been helpful to have filtered water. Otherwise, it was a good location and a quiet room.
Great place if you need an overnight place for an event at John Paul Jones Arena.

Liz’s place was a refuge inside Charlottesville. Her backyard patio was a perfect spot to catch up on some overdue reading and to watch songbirds. The room was comfortable and cozy and close walking distance to the Ix Artpark (7 mins.) & downtown pedestrian zone (14 mins.). I hope to stay here in the future!

What a lovely room with private bathroom. Fresh flowers welcomed me into the room which was spacious and felt like home. Liz was responsive to my questions and gave clear instructions of how to enter. It was only 5 minutes to a downtown hotel where I attended a conference. I really wished that I could have stayed longer to enjoy the sites in and around Charlottesville and to enjoy this homey room that looked out into a nice patio. I highly recommend this room with Liz as homeowner.

Stayed with Liz for a quick weekend winery tour with my wife! Loved being close to downtown at an affordable price!
Beautiful back patio area we would’ve taken advantage of in better weather.
Great place for quick trip in Charlottesville! 5 min walk to downtown and great restaurants!
Liz’s place was convenient for dining and activities. Clean, safe. She was extremely responsive. Would absolutely stay here again!
We loved our stay! Everything was clean and the patio area was really nice to have
Second time staying here! We really enjoy it and it’s so close to town and wineries!

A wonderful cozy stay that was quiet and had everything we needed. We especially loved the heated tile floors in the bathroom! Would recommend to anyone going to Charlottesville looking for a quiet and quaint getaway.
Comfy and cozy little spot near downtown.
Very Nice stay. Love the super high and comfy bed. Perfect for my overnight visit. Good price/value.
I'll stay again. No issues.
Really enjoyed my stay in Charlottesville at Liz’s place! Would recommend!
Perfect place for a weekend getaway in Charlottesville! Would nightly recommend Liz’s place!

Perfect spot for a little getaway to Charlottesville! Walkable to the downtown mall and the University grounds, but far enough that it’s quiet and parking is easy to find. We loved walking into the Belmont neighborhood for dinner and drinks. Liz and Rachel were so very kind, accommodating, and responsive. Beautiful room! Would definitely book again.

Great! - clean and comfortable, very nicely furnished and equipped place to stay. The bed was very comfy, the shower was one of the best, the thoughtfully equipped coffee bar had a (rare) electric kettle for making better-than-Keurig coffee or tea (of which there was a nice selection.) The heated bathroom floor was the cherry on the cake since we were there during some chilly weather. We walked to Lampo, the nearby restaurant that Liz recommends, and had a really wonderful meal. Great airbnb.
Thank you Liz!
--Trudi Steigerwald

Super close to downtown, ~10-15 minute walk. Ample street parking, plenty of space and perfect accommodation for a quick get away. Also Liz and Rachel were kind and quick to respond. Would stay again!
Perfect place for a quick visit to Charlottesville!
Very responsive host and excellent recommendations for dining. The space was cute, private and the bed super comfy! We almost wanted to order take out just to enjoy the comfort of the space longer.
Excellent host! Communication was outstanding. Highly recommend.
Perfect price and location to UVA.
Cute place to stay. Clean and comfortable.
Great stay! Liz was super flexible with check out and I really appreciated it! Very comfy bed
had a lovely two night stay at liz's place, felt right at home and would definitely recommend to others!
Hosts were very responsive, area was convenient and room was cozy and private!

Liz and her co-host were wonderful, and the Air B&B was exactly as described.
It's a quiet, and just a short distance from lots of nice restaurants and things to see and do.
I would definitely stay here again!

Very comfy bed - the suite had everything I needed for a brief stay and it was so nice that she had a pitcher of filtered water, tea, coffee, granola bars and oatmeal available, I love it when Airbnb hosts provide little extras like that.

Very responsive host. Easy to find and we were given very clear instructions how to access the private suite. Very comfortable bed, the softest sheets I have ever slept in. Everything was just right. House plants and eclectic decor made me feel right at home!

We loved our stay! It was perfect––Liz's place was so comfortable and convenient for my 11-year-old daughter and me. We visited Charlottesville for a quick overnight trip while we were in MD/DC for the Christmas holiday. We live in Los Angeles, and I always do a side trip when we visit my parents in MD/DC to introduce my LA-raised daughter to East Coast cities. I highly recommend Liz's place, and I would stay there again.

We had a great stay at Liz’s place! There was plenty of space and a 15 minute walk to the downtown area. We especially liked the heated floors in the bathroom. We would definitely recommend to anyone who is visiting Charlottesville!
It was a great stay! The instructions were super clear which was very helpful. Liz was very nice and the place was wonderful! Great stay overall!

Perfect place for a one night stopover by myself while traveling alongside a band that performed in downtown Charlottesville. Clean and comfortable, convenient, flexible, and easy, it was just what I needed.

Our rental was easy to find with clear instructions, so we felt right at home. It’s in a lovely location with restaurants in the immediate Belmont neighborhood and walkable to the downtown mall. We had a great stay!

This was a spur of the moment, decision for us, and we were lucky to find Liz‘s place. It was clean. It was quiet, was private and comfortable. We had a little glitch involving heating our place on a cold evening, and Liz responded promptly and when the heater couldn’t be adjusted, she brought us a space heater right away, and had the HVAC guy out the next day. Also, the bathroom floor is heated. Sounds like a small thing, but I wish we had one at home. We’d be happy to stay with Liz again, especially in the warmer time of the year when we could really enjoy the patio. Thanks for a great stay Liz!,
Stopped for a very quick visit. We enjoyed our stay!

Liz and Rachel's airbb was awesome! Easy check in and close to everything with free on street parking. Comfortable bed and nice sheets. Rachel was super quick to respond when I accidently locked myself out and she was helpful and kind. Very clean and had coffee stocked as well as a small fridge!

The place was perfect for our overnight stay in Charlottesville. Walking distance to the downtown mall area (although we chose to Uber). Check in was easy and the back yard was quiet. The room and bathroom were clean. The shower water didn't get as hot as I would have liked. Over all our experience was great and would definitely stay again.
Very clean and great location.
Liz was a wonderful host. I would stay here again.
A great comfortable places to stay and an easy walk to the downtown pedestrian area, Amtrak station and lots of great restaurants!
Awesome place for a quick trip for one night!

Great place to stay near restaurants and close to downtown Charlottesville. The thoughtful "little" things (coffee, granola bars, etc.) were an unexpected and pleasant surprise! Overall, we were very impressed and would definitely stay here again.
Liz’s place was clean and cozy. The private backyard is nice and the bed was very comfortable!

Such a cozy spot! I loved the cute decorations and the bed was so comfortable. Liz provided so many additional things that made the stay so homey. The space felt like its own area apart from the main house. There was plenty of street parking and it was very safe. I would absolutely stay here again! Thank you Liz!
Always a great place to stay. I even have my own Airbnb in the area and love staying here for a change of scenery!

The place was easy to find, quite comfortable and felt private. A first class experience.
Any my co-hosts were helpful and responsive.
The room was perfect for our night stay. Highly recommended.
Location was close to activities over the weekend. Much cheaper than a hotel on a football weekend.
Perfect room for a getaway trip to Charlottesville; perfect hosts as well.
Had a great stay! Super convenient and comfy
Super accommodating and friendly folks. Very tidy spot, rad location, comfy. Thanks!
We had a great and comfortable stay. The area was very fun and we would definitely return
Nice accommodation in a quite neighborhood. The room was very clean and offered everything we needed.

Great spot for a quick stay. Well appointed for a single room with bathroom. Especially appreciated the heated bathroom floor. Liz was a great host, friendly and very helpful with instructions etc. Yard is beautiful.

The space was at the back of the main house, and had a decent amount of privacy. Just a bedroom, bathroom and small kitchen/laundry space but had everything you might need. We ate at the outdoor table since there was no table inside. It was clean and good location!
I feel comfortable and safe. The laundry worked well and in and out the house was easy. Parked right outside.

We only stayed for one night but the room was super clean and the bed was very comfortable. We both slept like babies. The room was private and very cozy with thoughtful details. Thanks for having us 😎

My boyfriend and I stayed here for one night and felt it was perfectly nestled in the downtown area of Charlottesville, while still giving a surrounded-by-nature feeling. The listing was as described and we had no issues what so ever! Would stay here again!
Convenient location and very walkable!
Comfiest bed I’ve ever slept it 😊
Great location and close to downtown. Liz is fantastic and the place is a perfect stay while visiting C-ville

Super responsive host and cute cottage near Belmont and Downtown Charlottesville. The bed was very comfortable and I had a wonderful hot shower. Adorable, quirky, and comfortable for an overnight stay.
There is plenty of street parking and I walked downtown to enjoy the sights and find great food.

I had a very pleasant stay. Cute, clean and cozy room. Room is private and safe. Host is always very responsive.
This is my second time, and will definitely be back.
Great unit in a neighborhood close to everything. Nice and quiet, had everything one needs for a comfortable stay.
2nd time staying. very comfortable and conv

Stayed here for one night with my boyfriend for a wedding in Charlottesville and the airbnb was perfect! The directions for the check-in were spot on and the airbnb was super cute and clean. The perfect place for a few nights.

This guest suite was exactly what I needed for a short trip to visit family in Charlottesville. The room and space was clean and with a separate entrance in the back of the house felt private and serene. The location was great with an easy walk to the downtown mall. It’s a great spot for a solo traveler or couple.
Worked well as a quick stopover on a road trip. We walked to Tavola for dinner, and it was delicious! Clear and thoughtful communication, even offering an early check-in, was so appreciated.
Comfortable, clean, and convenient - a great spot to rest for the night, near downtown Cville.
Very comfortable room. We enjoyed learning to play a new game that was in the room, “Ingenious”. Thank you!

This spot was very functional for what we needed - a quick overnight in Charlottesville to look around the town and visit UVA on the way to the Shenandoah valley. It was clean with a comfortable bed and a functional layout. We liked the separate entrance through the courtyard and the separation from the main house via a shared breezeway. This place does not have a kitchen so it may not be ideal for a longer stay, but has some kitchen amenities like a small refrigerator with filtered water and a coffee maker and other kitchen items in the breezeway. It’s a fairly easy 6-ish block walk to the downtown outdoor mall. Overall, it worked well for our needs. Liz also offered us an early check in, which coincided exactly with our arrival in town so we appreciated that perfect timing!
Wonderful private room and bathroom with private entrance. Very clean and well thought out, bright, really comfortable bed. Neighborhood is very quiet. Not far from downtown

It’s like visiting a quaint private English garden, from the shaded overgrown walkway to the comfy seated bench. Wish we had more time to enjoy the garden area but did enjoy the birds in the morning. As for the room itself, just as described with a wonderfully comfortable bed and cozy space. Extremely clean with linens and clear instructions. Liz was so sweet to reach out and offer her assistance if needed. We will be sure to return when on the area

Perfect spot to stay for a quiet, comfortable night or two (or more) when visiting Charlottesville. Description and photos are very accurate; instructions for locating the key & accessing the unit were precise and easy-to-follow; and the bedroom and bath were spotless.
Great location and convenient check in

Loved staying here. It’s super close to our favorite taco spot , Brazos, and our favorite breakfast spot Belle. There was plenty of parking and when we didn’t want to drive the 5-10 min the downtown Ubers were easy to get and cheap. I would definitely stay here again.

Great little place for a couple to stay in in Belmont near the downtown mall. Private entrance, well appointed with mini fridge, toaster, microwave, and coffee stuff. The bed/pillows are nicer than a lot of beds you see at air bnbs.
All in all, a perfect spot to stay when in Charlottesville as it is close to highways and downtown stuff.
cozy spot to spend a business trip. Nice bed with Streaming TV. Convenient for short walk or drive to breweries and restaurants
Very nice spacious suite, had everything you need & great location very close to UVA.
10/10 experience! Fantastic for a long or short stay. Great location, very homey, and hosts are super friendly. Wouldn’t change a thing!
Pretty, quiet, attractive. I hope to go back some day.

Great neighborhood with easy street parking and walking distance from restaurants, breweries, and art. The place was cute and inviting with nice art on the walls, games, and coffee and snacks. Would stay here again!

Loved staying here! The room is so pretty and clean. Very walkable
to good restaurants and a wonderful location from which to explore Charlottesville.
Loved the decor. Also, this air BNB is in a walkable safe neighborhood. Liz left plush towels, needed toiletries and great coffee and snacks. Would consider staying there again if in Charlottesville.

Liz’s place is a comfortable, clean and safe spot just off a main road, walkable to downtown Charlottesville. Even though it is close to a larger street, it is very quiet. Very clean, with nice furnishings and easy to find and check in. Liz communicated well. The listing is accurate, a little path takes you to a comfy back yard and the entrance.
Great location, super cute, and very clean!
Enjoyed both the space, which was perfect for my brief stay, and conversation with the co-hosts Leigh and Nathan. Hope our paths cross again soon!
Adequate stay and the suite was clean. We would have enjoyed our stay more if the outdoor space was nicer. The neighborhood was a little sketchy. Inside amenities were as described.

This place is really nice and extremely well located. Liz and the others were very helpful and responsive. One thing to know, the room is off a shared entryway. You get a key to the entryway and your room and bathroom are your own, but it seemed like you couldn't really lock the room from the outside if you need to leave for part of the day. You can lock it from the inside.
Perfect for a quick trip. Peaceful retreat while being very walkable to lots of restaurants and entertainment options. Will be back!
Great stay. Easy check in and check out instructions, very responsive to messages
Great place. Comfiest bed I’ve ever slept on
Great place, tucked in a sweet backyard of roses & fireflies. Close to everything but still quiet while we were there.

First, you have to walk through the side of the yard that has overgrown foliage in the way. It is inconvenient. Second, as soon as you open the door there is the horrible stench of pet excrement spilling over from the main house. When checking for bedbugs, I found the mattress littered with huge stains, like it was taken from trash on the side of the road. Also, the plumbing in the bathroom backed up with little use. I usually don’t complain but I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!!
Nice sunny little place. Not the best neighborhood, but i felt safe enough. Comfy bed, nice decorations

Liz’s place was perfect for our one night stop we had in Charlottesville. It was an easy walk to local restaurants and shops. The bed was the most comfortable bed of our road trip! The room was very cozy and we felt at home. We enjoyed our quick stay!

Was headed to Charlottesville for a wedding and to celebrate my birthday! Found Liz’s place not far from downtown (an easy 15 minute walk)! Her instructions on how to get into the room were very detailed and made check in a breeze. The co-hosts were ext really friendly and even took the time to wish me happy birthday! Whenever I make it back to Charlottesville, I’ll definitely be checking their place out in the future! Highly recommend!
We enjoyed our stay! Easy to find with available street parking. Clean space that provided a private get away.
private and easily accessible entry

The room and amenities are exactly as described; however, I didn’t find the place as clean as others described. The shower curtain was stained and there were cobwebs. The washer & dryer, albeit nice that it’s available for use during our stay, was full of pet hair in the washer window and dryer filter was packed with an inch of lint & pet hair. I don’t mind pets by any means but when it comes to sharing a common space (ie laundry room), I would expect it to be cleaner.
Pulling up the to Airbnb left very little to be desired as the place was unkempt, where the grass hasn’t been mowed in weeks and landscaping overgrown. Furthermore, when coming and going from the Airbnb at night (which is located in the back of the house), lighting was minimal which made it hard to see walkways. Windows all around made it feel like someone was always watching when coming and going.
Positives: great communication from all hosts, thoughtful amenities, comfy bed, and heated floors. Worth it? Debatable.
This place is peaceful and close to UVA!

Liz’s place was the perfect stay in Charlottesville. I wish we were there longer, just a quick trip to break up a drive. But the space was very cozy… comfy bed, clean bathroom, great coffee and snack options. Would definitely book again if we come back, and hope to stay longer!
A great little room with a big comfy bed!
Wonderful place, perfect for a nice weekend in Charlottesville. Nice quiet neighborhood, 10-15 minute walk to downtown Mall with shops, restaurants, and bars.
Great location and walkable to downtown Mall area. Very private room and Liz was great to communicate with.
Came down to Charlottesville with a friend to go to a concert! Liz was a great host and helped us with whatever we needed and made us feel super welcome!
Cozy
Lovely little place! Clean, quiet, easily walkable to downtown Charlottesville.

I enjoyed my stay. The room and bathroom had a separate entrance apart from the rest of the house. It had everything I needed. Very clean, cute and comfortable! I loved being able to walk to several excellent restaurants. Thank you!

Enjoyed our stay and rested well. Friendly, responsive and efficient host. Loved the area, as it was conveniently situated to downtown and restaurants.
Will definitely be staying here, again.
We were grateful for the convenience of the washer and dryer. The room was beautiful and clean, and the bed was comfortable. We could walk to restaurants!

Very clean. Private. And extremely comfortable bed. The heated bathroom floors are amazing. The whole experience was absolutely incredible from early check in to a tarp being place over a puddle on the path when it started raining.
I enjoyed my stay.

Liz was very responsive, even reaching out to us the day prior to let us know that we could check in early. The stay was as billed, and everything was very smooth with our stay (albeit a brief one)!
Thanks so much for the great stay!
Liz's place was a perfect little place for my quick stay. It has an excellent location and was very cosy. Would be very nice for a couple!
An easy private stop while passing through town.
We had a great short stay at Liz's place in Charlottesville. Very walkable to the Downtown Mall as well as Belmont, and the bed was comfortable. Highly recommended!
Great place to stay on our way north from Florida!
A great stay and just as advertised. Thank you!
Small, but adequate

Liz’s place was absolutely perfect for my one night stay in a road trip. It had everything I needed, super comfortable bed & pillows, sparkling clean, and easy to walk to town! The check in instructions were very clear and easy to follow. You must check out Lampo Pizza!! Amazing food, cocktails, and people!! Would 100% stay again!
Great location and comfortable stay!

Very comfortable space with a beautiful surrounding yard and garden. Liz and roommates are very responsive and helpful and friendly. If you're looking for super super quiet, you can hear some car noise from the nearby busy street (only during rush hours) but the proximity to Central Charlottesville was worth it for me. Lots of extra thoughtful amenities like games and snacks in the room. Very comfortable, very easy and very convenient stay in Charlottesville.

Liz was responsive and helpful. The room was exactly as described and very clean. I appreciate the eco friendly choice in products and the toiletries that were provided! The heated bathroom floor was a great bonus that left me feeling like I stayed at a fancy hotel for an affordable price! Thanks Liz!
Great clean place - liz reached out to let me check in early too!
Quaint space. Very close to downtown mall, Wegman’s, and short Uber ride to JPJ.
Decent place. No curtains on windows above bed. No other issues
I had a great stay here. Thank you so much Liz!
I loved staying here! It was the perfect walk to all of my favorite places and the amenities were so nice! Comfy bed, squeaky clean and amazing hosts!

Well decorated, very clean (including sheets and towels) comfortable beds--the heated floors were a luxury since we were staying over a very cold weekend. The bathrooms were really nice and well-stocked, as was the kitchen--4 different ways to make coffee! We didn't actually cook anything while there, but the kitchen seemed to have everything you'd need.
This was perfect for my solo getaway. I felt at home and comfortable.
Great place. 5-10 minute drive to all the highlights in Charlottesville.
Lovely home. Very comfortable. Modern. Will look forward to staying here again.
Great spot, cool layout!
Super cute house in a quiet neighborhood. About a 25 minute to downtown mall. The house very well appointed and clean. I will definitely stay again.

We loved this airbnb. The location was great for us since it was close to family we were visiting. Blue Ridge's management was quite good and communications before our stay were very responsive and helpful. The only negative was that the heating system was something of a challenge. For folks considering this location in the winter months, they should get some direction before they arrive on how to keep the heat at a reasonably warm and consistent level. We only figured it out one day into our stay which meant we had a very cold first night. Otherwise, we loved the place.
Review for later
Great place to stay, close to everything! Clean, well stocked with anything you might need, great communication! Would highly recommend this place, so cozy!

Charming cottage in a convenient location. The neighborhood is calm and quiet, and we were able to walk to grounds easily. We enjoyed sitting on the back deck and drinking our coffee in the morning. Lovely weekend.

Fantastic rental property!!! Master bathroom shower was fantastic after a long day of sightseeing. Everything you can possibly need in the bathroom. Very clean and comfortable. Would HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!

The house is clean and roughly 1 mile from what I consider downtown Charlottesville. It can either be walked or use a ride share service. We went to the uva football game which is also very close. Thomas Jeffersons houseis also close by. We would stay there again
This AirBnb was fantastic - clean, spacious, well-located. Checking in was super easy and communication with the host team was always quick and helpful. I would definitely stay here in the future!
Beautiful, and felt like home. The kitchen was well stocked and the home was sparkling clean. We will be back!
Wonderful stay!

Pros:
Convenient location, about 10 minutes of walking distance to West Main Street where there are many nice restaurants on that street.
The interior decoration is pretty.
The host provides many amenities even the bandages, sewing needles, cotton swabs, cotton pads, and etc.
The host kindly provides coffee, tea, milk and other spices.
Cons:
The master bedroom has a sliding door and there is no lock.
The shade for the window is paper, the window of the 2nd bedroom faces the street and the street light is on all night, so the bedroom is very bright at night, you may want to use a sleep mask to help you sleep.
You have to park your car on the street, but the host provides permit, it’s not difficult to find parking spot.
We tried to use some of the blankets stored in the closet at night, but then found out some of them smell.
The mattress is too soft for my like.
This is a fantastic Airbnb in Charlottesville! It’s close to everything and is adorable! We stayed here for our wedding weekend, and it made the perfect bridal suite.
Wonderful property with excellent facilities and furnishings, plus a very helpful host. Fantastic in every respect. We will definitely be back to stay again.
Lovely home. Very clean. Easy access to everything in the Charlottesville area.

I've stayed in lots of AirBNB's, but never in a better one than this. Beautifully designed, beautifully maintained, immaculately clean, comfortable beds, and lots of little amenities (such a small first aid kit, which I needed). Oh, and the cutest back deck, backyard, and front patio. A++ accommodations!!
As advertised!
Charming cottage, good location
Clean and great location

The cottage is well located and within walking distance to UVA hospital. The house is nicely decorated and had everything we needed for our stay. It was also very clean and accessible. The host is responsive and nice. I would definitely stay there again.

The Blue Ridge BnB is exactly as advertised. It is a super cute place that is really conveniently located. We really appreciated how well stocked the house is. There is everything you could possibly want in the kitchen. We didn't cook on this trip, but the kitchen certainly had everything that you would need. We especially enjoyed the coffee and half and half!

This was our first visit to Charlottesville and I can say for certain it will not be our last! And if at all possible we will definitely stay at this fantastic home. Everything was well thought out in advance for their guest’s comfort. They even provided a basket of personal necessities than someone like myself will forget to pack LOL. And this was in both bathrooms too. My personal favorite was their white wooden rocking swing on the front porch. I enjoyed my coffee out there every morning. The communication was over the top as well! I sent a text the first day asking where I could find the coffee grinder (huge bag of fresh beans in the fridge) and literally 10 minutes later there was a brand new grinder in the box outside on the front porch! Lots of really interesting books to look through but my favorite was a book written by the owners and a little “bird” that was quite fun to read. Poor bird was kidnapped by squirrels for a ransom but later released without payment because the bird annoyed the kidnappers…… these two couples who renovated this house apparently had some fun with the bird! Next time I’m there I will be dressing that bird in a little University of Texas tee shirt!!! But don’t tell the bird because it’s a secret 🤐.
Great area for walking and waving to the friendly neighbors!!! You will not be disappointed staying here.

Blue Ridge BnB was absolutely lovely! So many small, meaningful conveniences and touches made us very comfortable during our stay. The place was clean, beautifully decorated, and very homey. It was a wonderful trip!

Cute comfortable house very nicely decorated! In walking distance to the hospital. Everything was clean and easy-to-use instructions for access and figuring out lights, etc. Loved that they had extra blankets, nice bathroom and shower! Highly recommended!
Great house, great location and good communication from hosts!

Location is so convenient. A playground is directly across the street and we were a 3 min drive or a 15min walk from every single thing we wanted to do in downtown charlottesville.
The house is adorable. Kitchen had everything we might need, the bathrooms were clean and nice, and it was more spacious than we even thought it would be.

This is a wonderful home. Just as described. All the amenities made us feel right at home as soon as we arrived. Matt was a great host with great recommendations and communicated well. Check in and check out were easy with no complications. Blue Ridge B&B thought of everything. Would definitely recommend this home and will stay again if we end up back in the area.
It’s a nice stay! Pretty clean and quiet.
Lovely cottage within walking distance of W Main Street. Nice communal space and back porch for relaxation. Very clean. Great communication leading up to, and during your stay. We highly recommend.
Absolutely perfect. Charming and cozy. Will definitely stay again when in the Charlottesville area.
Great house, very clean, extremely easy process to check in and fabulous location. Loved that we were able to walk downtown and enjoy Charlottesville.

A lovely house perfect for UVA visitors. Walking distance from the UVA campus and downtown. The house is cute, super clean and in a quiet neighborhood. We rented a car and went for great hikes during the weekends around Charlottesville and Crozet. Definitely recommend staying in this beautiful house!

Wow! What a great place to stay for a quick trip to Charlottesville. Came down with some girlfriends (UVA alum) for a reunion. The home was gorgeous, well-stocked, and comfortable. We enjoyed walking downtown and to the grounds, as well as hanging out inside and on the back deck. Great host communication. Would recommend & would stay again. Thank you!

This house is fantastic.
Our family of 4 had a great time here.
Everything was clean, bright and well thought out.
This kitchen was the best equipped kitchen I’ve ever had…and we’ve stayed all over the world.
Choose this house…you won’t regret it!
Such a cute place to stay for our visit to Charlottesville! Great amount of space and convenient location! Well equipped kitchen and bathrooms! Couldn’t have asked for a better experience!
Perfect place for our weekend stay. Super cool spot and even better in person than the photos. Just as listed and check in/out was very efficient. Not far from Main Street. Highly recommend.

Immaculate and cozy cottage. Tasteful eclectic decor. We truly felt at home with all the amenities that are provided such as the multiple ways to prepare coffee, the big screen TV with various streaming subscriptions, and the extra large walk-in shower off the main bedroom. Gorgeous hardwood floors and comfortable furniture. Check-in/check-out was easy and we knew that Matt was always a phone call or text away. We will definitely be returning to this property whenever we visit the Charlottesville area.
Great place, spacious and comfy beds and loved the kitchen and porch.
The location was centrally located and perfect for our purposes.
Very clean,,comfortable, and nice

Fantastic location in walking distance to the University, medical center, restaurants and so many other amenities. There’s a quiet neighborhood park across that my kids enjoyed. Every detail was considered and taken care of in advance, which made for a very enjoyable stay.

We stayed in this beautiful and comfortable home for my son's college orientation. It was very close to UVA grounds and restaurants in town. It is as lovely as pictured in the listing and the owners have provided high quality linens and towels. The kitchen is well stocked and has very nice appliances. Everything felt new and fresh and very clean! All instructions regarding the house were clear and check in was fast and easy. We will consider this listing as a go to location over the next four years!

This place is amazing! So cozy, clean, comfortable, welcoming! The decor is so awesome, and the hosts were kind and communicative. This was a perfect place to stay for convenient access to the university, also comfortable for working remotely. We'll definitely stay here again when we're back in town!
The most wonderful stay!—Very comfortable house and convenient to everything in Charlottesville!!!!

Wonderful, adorable cottage close to UVA. We were a family of 3 and enjoyed all the space including the great outdoor deck. Very clean and comfortable and all the extras were greatly appreciated. They thought of everything! Can’t wait to return.
Beautifully appointed, meticulously clean, & perfectly comfortable. A+++
The place was great! We were here with another couple for a wedding, and it was great being able to walk everywhere we needed to go.

This is probably the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in. A nice quiet location, conveniently situated for town - but most of all a really comfortable and well-designed house with great style. We would thoroughly recommend this property.
Great little house! Well appointed and great for a little getaway. The location is great and communication was super easy.

This is a good location for university and downtown. It’s nicely kept and quite comfortable. Would definitely stay here again! Quite liked it. Communication very good with owners who were helpful with some questions we had. Definitely a “winner.” Private too.
Very comfortable and convenient stay, great value.

Charming and well appointed cottage, centrally located in Charlottesville on a very quiet street. The house was immaculate and beautiful, and yet had the kind of old house character that is hard to replicate. Gorgeous wood floors, tall ceilings, beautiful natural light in every room, mid century modern furniture, lush beds and linens, interesting books, modern bathrooms, 2 lovely porches - what more could you ask for? Minutes away from UVA, restaurants, and shops.

One of the best AB&B experiences I’ve ever had. Charlottesville is one of the best cities in the country, and you won’t find a better place to stay when visiting than this house. It’s a perfect location, and the host has clearly gone above and beyond to make it feel like home. 11/10!
A wonderful place with gorgerous kitchen! Just luv it.
Adorable house in a great location!

Got home last evening from Charlottesville and wanted to promptly write a positive review. Would definitely stay here again. The house is across from a small park which turned out really well for our group. The place was very clean, thoughtful touches were added around the house for the guests comfort, and the neighborhood was quiet. The property is on a corner but the road was not busy. There is a nice deck out back where we enjoyed having a cocktail prior to going to dinner. The house is about a mile from restaurant a"row". One could walk but we opted to drive.
When scrolling through the pictures of the property, you will note that the primary bedroom has a "barn door". The En Suite bathroom does not have a door on it. While the bathroom can not be viewed unless inside the bedroom, one might prefer more privacy. Increased privacy is a personal preference that some may appreciate and doesn't matter to others. The bathroom is very pretty.
Thank you for a lovely weekend!

We had a wonderful stay here. The place is comfy, very clean, and well-stocked. Matt was great with communication. Parking is available right outside the house in a quiet neighborhood. We would totally stay here again if we visit Charlottesville.
Great location. Would definitely stay there again.
This is a lovely place- beautifully decorated, well appointed, super clean.

This was a beautiful home, nicely furnished with comfortable upgrades and great amenities. Felt like a home away from home which was a welcome find after just staying at a hotel in a different city. There is also a playground across the street which is great for those with kids. More of a challenge to walk to downtown areas with kids but doable otherwise. Would recommend driving if you have young children. This is a hidden gem in Charlottesville and I would definitely recommend staying here!

Immaculately clean, beautifully furnished, well stocked bungalow minutes from downtown Charlottesville. The home was well stocked with thoughtful amenities. The kitchen, baths, and laundry room all had high end appliances and were newly remodeled. I would highly recommend this rental to anyone looking for a nicely appointed quiet home near downtown!

Yes, we HIGHLY recommend the Yellow House. Location was perfect for visiting the presidential homes - Monticello, Montpelier and Highland. A short drive to the downtown walking street, restaurants and the University.
The home is WELL stocked with anything a guest might need. The hosts have thought of EVERYTHING, (even CPAP water!). We were impressed!
The layout is very comfortable, spacious. The street is quiet. There's a park across the street and a main road nearby for easy access.
Thank you for a delightful stay!

What a lovely home. The furnishings were stylish and comfortable. The home was very clean. We only stayed 2 nights so didn't cook therefore not certain how well equipped things were. That being said we had everything we needed. There was coffee pot, tea kettle, wine opened and glasses. Lovely soaps were provided too. Lots of restaurants nearby. Thank you. We look forward to being able to come back.

This Air B&B is perfect for a group or family. It was clean and had all of the amenities listed. We couldn't have asked for an easier stay. We brought our 3yo and were thrilled by the playground/park located directly across the street. We would love to stay here again in the future!

The house provides easy living with no steps and convenience to many locations. I appreciated Matt's communication and helpfulness in going the extra mile to help us with a challenge. I enthusiatically recommend it.

We had a lovely time. The house is great - plenty of space for 3-4 people, bathrooms and kitchen are new and fresh, heated floors in the bathrooms and bedroom were such a treat (now I want to redo my whole house at home!). Everything was clean and working well. The neighborhood was quiet and felt safe. I initially hesitated to book this house because I couldn’t tell from photos how the area would be, as I’m not familiar with that part of town. We actually really liked being in the residential area. The only drawback was that we would have wanted to walk to UVA central Grounds and you can’t go there directly on foot because of the train tracks in between. But by car, it was convenient to everything we wanted to do. I would definitely stay here again.

What a gem! Everything was sparkly clean, freshly updated and very comfy. The owners have been very thoughtful in providing high end toiletries in both bathrooms, plus a selection of teas, coffee filters and basic cooking ingredients in the kitchen. Unfortunately we were only able to stay for 2 nights and I wish it could have been longer. The owner was very communicative. The furnishings were all tasteful and modern, with a fresh European feel. The pictures don’t do it justice. I wish it was warm enough to utilize the porch swing and patio furniture. I’m very fussy and this didn’t disappoint! Very impressed- Thank you

Wow! What a beautiful place. Everything was amazing, it was decorated professionally, very nice linens, well stocked kitchen with new appliances, charming outside deck, the list could go on. My children and I loved it. We were there for a UVA tour and it is a 5 minute drive. Great location. I wish every Airbnb I stayed in was this nice. I would stay again without hesitation, I might need an excuse to come back to Charlottesville to stay again. Thank you Matt.
Very nice clean spacious cottage. Great place!

This home is in a great location and has plenty of space for everything you need. Matt was very communicative and answered my questions before I even had them! The check-in and out processes were seamless and easy to follow. I would highly recommend this home for your next stay in Charlottesville!! My only suggestion would be to bring a sleep mask for those sunny mornings when you want a little more sleep.
Check-in and out were a breeze, house was clean and the location was perfect!
Beautiful home in Charlottesville. Easy access to everything. Perfect place for two couples visiting for the weekend. Highly recommend!

It’s so nicely stocked like a real home: flour, sugar, coffee, cooking oil, even hair products.
The spacious shower alone with three heads was worth the price of the rental. The towels were plush. And radiant floor heat!
It was like staying at a friend’s place who really wanted you to feel welcomed.

Great place in Charlottesville! Very clean and has all the comforts! Matt provided suggestions and was very responsive. Perfect place to stay especially if you need to stay overnight for hospital appointments. We were very pleased.

Loved this place! Decor was adorable and it was a good size as well. Plenty of towels, toiletries in case, glassware, washer/dryer, etc. Was the perfect hideaway for the weekend and super close to campus. The host was very clear on check in/out and very helpful, even recommended some good food spots. Would stay again!!!

We had a lovely stay here, in Charlottesville. The house feels very recently renovated and is beautifully appointed with so many stylish touches. A bathroom for each bedroom (one en-suite) makes it perfect. Comfortable and cozy, with easy street parking right outside. We couldn’t have had a better experience.
Wonderful stay! So many thoughtful details, comfortable beds, and location is excellent. Communication and check in are simple and hosts are available as needed. Will stay here again!
Great place!
Amazing place to stay! So cute, clean, renovated and so cutely decorated. It’s a short walk to town and such a cute area to explore. Had a great time and will be back for my next trip there !

This is a fantastic, beautiful and comfortable house, newly remodeled and set up with super comfy furniture and great decor. The street was quiet, the house was easy to find, and Alex and Matt made the whole process easy. We will definitely be staying here again, next time we're in Charlottesville!
Absolutely enjoyed our stay,, the place was close to everything we needed and absolutely lovely.
Very clean and very comfortable

One of the most well-appointed AirBnBs at which I’ve stayed. Convenient to all things UVA. Especially good for anyone with ambulatory issues or needs proximity to UVA University Hospital. My partner convalesced here after she had fusion surgery.
Loved our stay here! Close to downtown, great decor, amazing showers, easy and quick communication. We’d definitely stay here again!
